languages.text: "До недавнего времени Простор Коронус едва ли можно было назвать имперским регионом. С прибытием {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} ситуация изменилась, но ненамного. Считайте, что здесь действуют свои порядки, более радикальные, но допускающие нестандартный подход там, где он сулит победу. Коронус не зря считается территорией Вольных Торговцев. Только у них достаточно военных сил, дерзости и прав, дарованных {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g}, чтобы пережить прыжок в неисследованную часть Простора. А в случае удачного исхода — удержать то, что сумели завоевать на фронтире".

traits.locale_text: "До недавнего времени Простор Коронус едва ли можно было назвать имперским регионом. С прибытием {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} ситуация изменилась, но ненамного. Считайте, что здесь действуют свои порядки, более радикальные, но допускающие нестандартный подход там, где он сулит победу. Коронус не зря считается территорией Вольных Торговцев. Только у них достаточно военных сил, дерзости и прав, дарованных {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g}, чтобы пережить прыжок в неисследованную часть Простора. А в случае удачного исхода — удержать то, что сумели завоевать на фронтире".

languages.text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."
languages.original_text: "До недавнего времени Простор Коронус едва ли можно было назвать имперским регионом. С прибытием {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} ситуация изменилась, но ненамного. Считайте, что здесь действуют свои порядки, более радикальные, но допускающие нестандартный подход там, где он сулит победу. Коронус не зря считается территорией Вольных Торговцев. Только у них достаточно военных сил, дерзости и прав, дарованных {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g}, чтобы пережить прыжок в неисследованную часть Простора. А в случае удачного исхода — удержать то, что сумели завоевать на фронтире".

traits.locale_text: "Until recently, the Koronus could hardly have been called an Imperial region. The situation has changed with the arrival of the Lord Inquisitor, but not by much. This place operates under wartime rules, you see — harsher rules, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse and, in the event of a successful expedition, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

"Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called an Imperial region. The situation has changed with the arrival of the Lord Inquisitor, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse and, in the event of a successful expedition, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

"Until recently, the Koronus could hardly have been called an Imperial region. The situation has changed with the arrival of the Lord Inquisitor, but not by much. The Koronus is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse and, in the event of a successful expedition, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

"Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

languages.text: “直到最近不久，科罗努斯扩区还很难称得上是帝国的疆域。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}大审判官{/g}的到来改变了这样的情况，但他的影响也很有限。如您所知，这片区域有它自己的运行规则，它比帝国的律法更加极端。但与此同时，这里的规则也允许您另辟蹊径，获得胜利。科罗努斯扩区被视作行商浪人的领地，这并非没有原因。只有行商浪人才拥有足够的胆识与军事力量，在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}赋予的权力之下，探索科罗努斯扩区尚未开辟的区域，存活下来……如果一切顺利，还能守住他们在探索过程中开辟的疆土。”
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: “直到最近不久，科罗努斯扩区还很难称得上是帝国的疆域。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判长{/g}的到来改变了这样的情况，但他的影响也很有限。如您所知，这片区域有它自己的运行规则，它比帝国的律法更加极端。但与此同时，这里的规则也允许您另辟蹊径，获得胜利。科罗努斯扩区被视作行商浪人的领地，这并非没有原因。只有行商浪人才拥有足够的胆识与军事力量，在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}赋予的权力之下，探索科罗努斯扩区尚未开辟的区域，存活下来……如果一起顺利，还能守住他们在探索过程中开辟的疆土。”

languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the Lord Inquisitor, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the Warrant to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

languages.text: «Hasta hace poco la Extensión de Koronus distaba mucho de poder considerarse una región del Imperium. La llegada del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g} ha cambiado las cosas, pero no demasiado. Este lugar se rige por sus propias normas. Por así decirlo, son más radicales pero permiten un enfoque más flexible cuando la victoria está asegurada. A fin de cuentas, hay una razón para que la Extensión de Koronus se considere territorio de Comerciantes Independientes. Solo ellos tienen el suficiente poderío militar, el valor y los derechos que les otorga la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, y todo ello es necesario para sobrevivir al salto a las regiones inexploradas de la Extensión... y, una vez alcanzado el éxito, para conservar todo lo obtenido en la frontera».
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta hace poco la Extensión de Koronus distaba mucho de poder considerarse una región imperial. La llegada del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g} ha cambiado las cosas, pero no demasiado. Este lugar se rige por sus propias normas. Por así decirlo, son más radicales pero permiten un enfoque más flexible cuando la victoria está asegurada. A fin de cuentas, hay una razón para que la Extensión de Koronus se considere territorio de Comerciantes Independientes. Solo ellos tienen el suficiente poderío militar, el valor y los derechos que les otorga la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, y todo ello es necesario para sobrevivir al salto a las regiones inexploradas de la Extensión... y, una vez alcanzado el éxito, para conservar todo lo obtenido en la frontera».

languages.text: 「つい最近まで、コロヌス・エクスパンスは帝国の宙域とは呼べない場所でした。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の到着で状況は変わったが、それほど大きな変化があったわけではありません。ここはには独自の規則があります。それはいわば、より過激なものではありますが、勝利が約束されている場合には、標準的でないアプローチも許されるものでもあります。コロヌス・エクスパンスが自由開拓者の領土とされているのには理由があります。自由開拓者だけが、十分な軍事力と大胆さを持ち、エクスパンスの未踏の地へと踏み込んで生き延びるための権利が{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}によって与えられているのです…そして、成功の暁には、そのフロンティアで享受したものすべてを手にできるのです」
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: 「つい最近まで、コロヌス・エクスパンスは帝国の宙域とは呼べない場所でした。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の到着で状況は変わったが、それほど大きな変化があったわけではありません。ここはには独自の規則があります。それはいわば、より過激なものではありますが、勝利が約束されている場合には、標準的でないアプローチも許されるものでもあります。コロヌス・エクスパンスが自由開拓者の領土とされているのには理由があります。自由開拓者だけが、十分な軍事力と大胆さを持ち、エクスパンスの未踏の地へと踏み込んで生き延びるための権利が{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}によって与えられているのです…そして、成功の暁には、そのフロンティアで享受したものすべてを手にできるのです」

languages.text: "Bis vor kurzem konnte man die Koronus-Ausdehnung kaum als Gebiet des Imperiums bezeichnen. Durch die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} hat die Lage sich verändert, wenn auch nur geringfügig. Hier gelten eigene Regeln, müsst Ihr wissen. Radikalere, gewissermaßen, aber doch Regeln, die ein vom Standard abweichendes Vorgehen gestatten, wenn Aussicht auf einen Sieg besteht. Die Koronus-Ausdehnung gilt nicht umsonst als Territorium der Freihändler. Nur Freihändler besitzen die militärische Macht, die Waghalsigkeit und die Rechte des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g}, die nötig sind, um den Sprung in den unerforschten Raum der Ausdehnung zu überleben ... Und nur sie können im Erfolgsfall festhalten, was sie im Grenzgebiet erobert haben."
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: "Bis vor kurzem konnte man die Koronus-Ausdehnung kaum als imperiales Gebiet bezeichnen. Durch die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} hat die Liga sich verändert, wenn auch nur geringfügig. Hier gelten eigene Regeln, müsst Ihr wissen. Radikalere, gewissermaßen, aber doch Regeln, die ein vom Standard abweichendes Vorgehen gestatten, wenn Aussicht auf einen Sieg besteht. Die Koronus-Ausdehnung gilt nicht umsonst als Territorium der Freihändler. Nur Freihändler besitzen ausreichend die militärische Macht, die Waghalsigkeit und die Rechte des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g}, die nötig sind, um den Sprung in den unerforschten Raum der Ausdehnung zu überleben ... Und nur sie können im Erfolgsfall festhalten, was sie im Grenzgebiet erobert haben."

languages.text: « Jusqu'à récemment, on ne pouvait guère considérer les Étendues de Koronus comme un territoire de l'Imperium. L'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g} a quelque peu amélioré la situation, mais la différence n'est pas flagrante. Cet endroit obéit à ses propres règles, voyez-vous. Elles sont plus radicales, pour ainsi dire, mais elles permettent également une approche non conventionnelle lorsque la victoire est assurée. Ce n'est pas pour rien que les Étendues de Koronus sont considérées comme le domaine des libres-marchands. Avec leur puissance militaire, leur audace et les droits que leur confère la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, eux seuls sont capables de survivre aux expéditions dans les zones inexplorées des Étendues... et, en cas de succès, de conserver quoi qu'ils puissent réussir à capturer dans cette frontière. »
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: « Jusqu'à récemment, on ne pouvait guère considérer les Étendues de Koronus comme un territoire impérial. L'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g} a quelque peu amélioré la situation, mais la différence n'est pas flagrante. Cet endroit obéit à ses propres règles, voyez-vous. Elles sont plus radicales, pour ainsi dire, mais elles permettent également une approche non conventionnelle lorsque la victoire est assurée. Ce n'est pas pour rien que les Étendues de Koronus sont considérées comme le domaine des libres-marchands. Avec leur puissance militaire, leur audace et les droits que leur confère la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, eux seuls sont capables de survivre aux expéditions dans les zones inexplorées des Étendues... et, en cas de succès, de conserver quoi qu'ils puissent réussir à capturer dans cette frontière. »

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği, İmparatorluk himayesine henüz girmiş sayılır. Vaziyet, {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun{/g} gelişiyle bir nebze olsun değişti. Bu toprakların, daha uç sayılabilecek kendi kaideleri vardır. Fakat bu kaidelerin, zaferi getirebilecek durumlarda sıra dışı yaklaşımlara müsaade ettiği de bir gerçek. Koronus Enginliği'nin Hür Tacir bölgesi olması tesadüf değil. Enginlik'in ayak değmemiş kısmına adım atmak için gerekli askerî güce, cesarete ve {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'ye{/g} yalnızca Hür Tacirler sahiptir... Muhtemel bir başarının ardından sınırda elde ettiklerini elinde tutmaya da ancak onların gücü yeter."
languages.original_text: "Until recently, the Koronus Expanse could hardly have been called a region of the Imperium. The situation has changed with the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, but not by much. This place operates under its own rules, you see — more radical, so to speak, but ones that allow for a non-standard approach where there is a promise of victory. The Koronus Expanse is considered Rogue Trader territory for a reason. Only Rogue Traders have sufficient military might, audacity, and the rights granted them by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} to survive the leap into the unexplored part of the Expanse... and in the event of a successful outcome, to hold onto whatever they manage to capture on the frontier."

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği, İmparatorluk himayesine henüz girmiş sayılır. Vaziyet, {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu{/g}'nun gelişiyle bir nebze olsun değişmiştir. Bu toprakların, daha uç sayılabilecek kendi kaideleri vardır. Fakat bu kaidelerin, zaferi getirebilecek durumlarda sıra dışı yaklaşımlara müsaade ettiği de bir gerçek. Koronus Enginliği'nin Hür Tacir'e ait bir bölge olması tesadüf değil. Enginlik'in ayak değmemiş kısmına adım atmak için gerekli askerî güce, cesarete ve {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'ye yalnızca Hür Tacirler sahiptir... Muhtemel bir başarının ardından sınırda elde ettiklerini elinde tutmaya da ancak onların gücü yeter."
